On Sunday 07 June 2009, Jan Algermissen wrote:
> It would also prevent media type explosion when dealing with more  
> diverse (enterprise) domain types[1] than found in the HTML-Web
> world.
[...]
> [1] Thinking of Account, Party, Product, Contract,... - people often
>   seem to want to make up a media type for each one of them, which is
> IMHO not the right way to apply media types to the enterprise domain.

Why isn't it? And what would be the right way?

Michael
